## FirebaseOptions.apiKey property

An encrypted string used when calling certain APIs that don't need to access private user data (example value: `AIzaSyDOCAbC123dEf456GhI789jKl012-MnO`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apiKey?: string;
```
